commit_scope: Merge default codex model aliases with environment overrides so partial alias maps cannot disable gtp-5.3-codex normalization on routing or hosted runner execution paths.
evidence_refs: Hosted route mismatch observed: task_80112263ea23cf20 created command with --model gtp-5.3-codex under partial/legacy alias config.
Added regressions for partial env alias maps in routing + runner alias resolution
maintainability_audit_report.json refreshed by local PR guard

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting CI, merge, and hosted post-deploy alias task success proof.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Even when AGENT_MODEL_ALIAS_MAP or AGENT_CODEX_MODEL_ALIAS_MAP omits gtp aliases, default gtp-5.3-codex normalization remains active and hosted runner uses gpt-5-codex.
test_flows: create task with context.model_override=gtp-5.3-codex and verify command/model resolve to gpt-5-codex
run hosted codex task and verify runner_model_alias shows requested gtp-5.3-codex with effective gpt-5-codex
